recsys_turn.message: That's awesome to hear you're loving "Catchfire"! If you're looking to explore more bands with that intense, melancholic alternative vibe, I think you might enjoy "Dreams Never End" by New Order. While a bit different from The Jesus and Mary Chain's signature noise, it carries that melancholic, atmospheric alternative rock feel from the same era. Give it a spin and see what you think!
